title: How to befriend Virginia in Sons of the Forest
description: In a world that wants to kill you, Virginia is a helping hand.

title: I tried the 'world's first crypto-backed energy drink,' and it tastes like it was secreted from the blockchain
description: Despite all the passive income opportunities, I will pass on "FOMO Fuel."

title: The new best boy of videogames is Kelvin in Sons of the Forest
description: The single best thing about Sons of the Forest is my new NPC helper.

description: It's been four years since Baldur's Gate 3 was announced, and a lot has changed.

title: Dark and Darker will hold one more playtest in April
description: Developer Ironmace wants a little more shakedown time before Dark and Darker launches into early access.

title: The secret to Elden Ring's open world success is uncopyable
description: Don't expect big budget games to try to mimic Elden Ring, because they can't copy what made it a phenomenon.

title: Where to find the rope gun for the zipline in Sons of the Forest
description: The rope gun is the tool you'll need to grab if you want to zipline your way to that shovel.

title: Where to find the rebreather in Sons of the Forest
description: The rebreather is pretty easy to snatch early on in Sons of the Forest if you know which cave to look in.

title: Hogwarts Legacy players have murdered more than 1 billion Dark Wizards
description: The game about teenagers learning magic at a 19th-century wizard school is a big hit—and seriously bloody.

title: Superheroes and live service is a dreadful combination
description: Developers I am begging you, stop trying to make this happen.

title: I accidentally turned on big head mode in Sons of the Forest and now I'm scarred for life
description: Go big or go home (I'm going home).

title: The Day Before's calendar app nemesis confirms it owns disputed copyright, would like you to know it's been around for 13 years
description: TheDayBefore wants The Day Before to know TheDayBefore owns 'The Day Before'.

description: Vampire Survivors claimed a title, too.

title: Mini LED gaming monitors are a bad idea in theory and in practice they're even worse
description: Don't be fooled, this is not the high-end screen tech we've been waiting for.

title: iBUYPOWER celebrates the launch of the HYTE Y40 Case with two new RDY systems
description: If you're thinking of celebrating the new year with an upgrade, we've got good news. High-end PC vendor iBUYPOWER rang in 2023 with not one, but two new additions to its product selection, both featuring the recently-released HYTE Y40 Case—the Gaming RDY Y40BG202 and the Creator RDY Y40BG201.

title: I invited strangers into my home to try a VR treadmill. I survived, and they absolutely loved it
description: "Where was this when VR came out!"

title: Where to find the shovel in Sons of the Forest
description: Make sure you're prepared.

title: I'm excited that BioWare is 'trying something new' with Dragon Age: Dreadwolf, but for the love of god actually tell us something
description: The latest developer blog is more a lesson in game design than a meaningful update.

title: That postmodern Lemmings-like where a Shiba Inu saves humanity is getting a PC version and a limited-time demo
description: You've got a little over a week to get some hands-on time with Humanity.

title: John Romero honoured alongside the teacher who made world's first edutainment game
description: I can't believe 1964's Sumerian Game hasn't gotten a remaster.

description: Duskers is a perfect organism.

title: Sons of the Forest: How to save your game
description: With death around every corner in Sons of the Forest, you'll want to save your progress often. But you'll need to do a quick bit of building first.
